about_the_game:
Velvet Bite: Softly, With Teeth

ベルベット·バイト / 轻咬丝绒 / 벨벳 바이트
Romance with Vampires

You've been invited to a Halloween party! Yay!
Music! Food! Drinks! Vampires!
Wait. VAMPIRES!?

A Romantic Visual Novel
featuring 6 romanceable vampires.

Main Routes

Madison



CV. Kojyo Rin

That's my question to ask.
Why are you here?

Your roommate!
She's not happy to be around you, obviously.

Forrest



CV. Hozuki Kaoru

City life isn't good for your mental health.
Vampires also need greens to heal.

Kind and caring.
His dessert wasn't very good. Too bad.

Yvonne



CV. Uduki Hana

Hm, what's good for a fairy?
Cutie pie? Or sweetheart?

A beauty, known to never age.
Runs a business.

Sebastian



CV. Utamaru

I mistook you for a different person.
I guess I was drunk.

Book lover and movie enthusiast.
Not a social person.

Bonus Routes

Charlotte



CV. TBA

So, was the party worth it?

Your psychiatrist.
She's also a vampire, by the way.

Everard



CV. TBA

Only do the fun stuff.
That's my life philosophy.

Is he a magician or a con artist?
We don't know.

Features

#vampire #halloween #pastel
#choices-matter #text-based #romance
#josei #joseimuke #LGBTQ+ #amare

💘 Name your Main Character
💘 Beautiful Art
💘 Original Soundtrack
💘 Voice Acting
